content.question: Which of the following was a short-term effect of the Mongol conquests on Islamic Central Asia and the Middle East?

choices.label: The displacement of Muslim merchant communities by Mongol merchants
The establishment of several European crusader states in the Middle East
The decline of major Muslim cities and disruptions of economic and cultural activities
The conversion of the Mongols to Buddhism and the subsequent spread of Buddhism across much of the region

content.answer: The decline of major Muslim cities and disruptions of economic and cultural activities

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
